thread.title: kathryn rowcliffe

author: kathryn rowcliffe
title: kathryn rowcliffe
text: Christopher was an excellent guide. He made our trip smooth, enjoyable and was extremely informative with not only the sites we visited but lots of other information about Poland and its history. Our day was tailor made by Christopher to ensure we got the most out of the places we visited and I would not hesitate to recommend him. Well done and keep up the great work. kathryn
